summary: This document details the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein on July 6, 2019, pursuant to a federal warrant related to sex trafficking charges. The report includes information about the arrest location, charges, and personal details of Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested in connection with a federal investigation into sex trafficking and charged with conspiracy and trafficking of minors.

persons.name: Judge Barbara Moses
persons.context: Judge Barbara Moses signed the federal warrant under which Epstein was arrested.

persons.name: Paul W. Byrne
persons.context: Officer Paul W. Byrne was involved in the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Kathy Ruemellen
persons.context: Kathy Ruemellen is mentioned as an acquaintance of Epstein, with a phone number provided in the document.

connections.description: Judge Barbara Moses issued the federal warrant for Epstein's arrest.
Paul W. Byrne was the arresting officer for Epstein.
Kathy Ruemellen is identified as an acquaintance of Epstein.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested pursuant to a federal warrant related to sex trafficking charges.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on July 6, 2019, pursuant to a federal warrant.
He was charged with sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.
The arrest was executed by the New York City Police Department.
Judge Barbara Moses signed the warrant for Epstein's arrest.
Kathy Ruemellen is mentioned as an acquaintance of Epstein.
